column8: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Indians, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.
An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.
This live-action take on the legendary fairytale finds Jack going up the beanstalk to outwit the giant and rescue a little girl that has been transformed into a harp.
A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.
Documentary about notorious punk rock performer GG Allin.
Seven Something is a special love movie made to celebrate the glorious film company, GTH's 7th anniversary...

Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.
While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors who want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.
A drifter comes to town where his brother is sheriff. His brother is actually a robber who broke the real sheriff's leg and left him for dead...
Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

A diplomat is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.
Erik is expelled from school for fighting. He ends up at a private boarding school where the senior students control the young ones...
A con man comes to a Midwestern town with a scam using a boy's marching band program, but things don't go according to plan.
Two cops team up to get back a kidnapped daughter.
Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
Inevitable is a realistic paraphrase of a classic teen-movie, a deep dive into the 'Grey zone' of sexual abuse...
The dramatic story of Julian, a Dominican drug lord who despite his confinement in prison, was still...
A teenage American girl while visiting her father, is thrown into London society during the "Debutante Season".
A pair of corporate spies who share a steamy past hook up to pull off the ultimate con job on their respective bosses.
With stolen top-secret technology, terrorists have created a next-generation Universal Soldier - an...
Joan Webster is an ambitious and stubborn middle-class English woman determined to move forward since her childhood...
A down-and-out writer sells his soul to the devil in exchange for fame and fortune.
A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.
A coming-of-age story about a 13-year-old girl trying to fit into both a posh private school and an ordinary public school.
A love affair begins harmless, but it later turns out to be a huge problem for the pair.

Geoffrey Collins lost his wife and daughter to a better provider after losing his job and home. For one summer day in the only place he has left that gives him peace and happiness, he will find out that loss may be permanent.
A public housing tenement is plunged into a dark storm of supernatural chaos.
An exploration of the intersection between religion and homosexuality in the U.S. and how the religious right has used its interpretation of the Bible to stigmatize the gay community.
A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children. Based on a novel by Richard Yates.
Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the 1960s.
When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.
A 1939 test pilot asks his best friend to use him as a guinea pig for a cryogenics experiment. Daniel...
Dexter, age 11, who has AIDS, and his next door neighbor Eric, a little older and much bigger, become best friends...
The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.
Angelo "Snaps" Provolone made his dying father a promise on his deathbed: he would leave the world of crime and become an honest businessman...
Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race-car driver to 2009 New York, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.
Con artists plan to fleece the eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long lost Uncle Fester.

In this Hunger Games spoof, Kantmiss Evershot must fight for her life in the 75th annual Starving Games, where she could also win an old ham, a coupon for a foot-long sub, and a partially eaten pickle.
A schoolteacher teams up with with a priest to stop a town being overrun by vampires.
Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy that defeated him and has since become adult.
CHARGE captures a pivotal moment in motor sport history: the advent of high-speed, zero-emissions racing...
A Polish-Jewish family comes to the USA at the beginning of the Twentieth Century. There, the family and their children try to make themselves a better future in the so-called promised land.
When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.
A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer. Paris.
The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.
Ranch hand Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.
The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.
The life story of basketball sensation, Jeremy Lin.
Amber dreams of escaping her small town existence and persuades her friends to accompany her to find an apartment in the big city...
The conservative son of a thrifty conman begrudgingly joins his father on the road -- after being released from jail for one of his dad's earlier crimes.
The story of Nick Leeson, an ambitious investment broker who singlehandedly bankrupted one of the oldest and most important banks in Britain.
How do you capture the essence of Scotland in just one film? You invite people from all across the country...
This is a short horror film that will follow young Ester as she enters the murky waters of middle school...
Silver, a teenage boy desperate to score with his long time girlfriend Sheila is pursued by many women in the community when an erroneous rumor circulates about his prowess.
A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

Yella is estranged from her possessive and violent husband; but he can't quite bring himself to give her up. When their fraught interaction finally comes to dramatic conclusion, Yella's life takes an odd shift.
A team of several researchers travel to the Swiss Alps to investigate a scientific discovery on human evolution.
A documentary on Arnel Pineda, who was plucked from YouTube to become the new singer for the rock & roll band, Journey.
Two children are teleported to a magical island and search for the giant Argon to save it.
On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus' home.
A soldier returning from the war in Afghanistan uncovers a conspiracy involving the intelligence services and a gang of drug dealers.
Based on the true story of Zuzu Angel, a famous Brazilian fashion designer in the 70's, who searches for her son Stuart...
An attorney intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he's trying to prosecute.
Happy Endings weaves multiple stories to create a witty look at love, family and the sheer unpredictablity of life itself.
A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

column6: Italian German Latin English Spanish Polish French
column8: A story centered on the relationship between the newly elected Pope and his therapist.
France, 1936-37. The Popular Front wins elections, the Spanish Civil War begins, and Hitler and Stalin are manipulating and spying...
Spring 1936, a young unemployed communist, David, leaves his hometown Liverpool to join the fight against fascism in Spain...
Adapted from a play by Noel Coward, Charles and his second wife Ruth, are haunted by the ghost of his first wife, Elvira. Medium Madame Arcati tries to help things out by contacting the ghost.
Samir is a very successful doctor: He not only looks after his patient's various maladies, but also looks after his female patients' hearts...
In the rail yards of Queens, contractors repair and rebuild the city's subway cars. These contracts are lucrative...
Su Qi-Er retired from his life as a renowned Qing dynasty general in order to pursue his dream of a family and his own martial arts school...
Although they are successful fishmongers, Stan convinces Ollie that they should become fishermen too, but making a boat seaworthy is an easy task.
Awaking from a coma to discover his wife has been killed in a car accident, Ben's world may as well have come to an end...
An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.
When a young soldier leaves for a mountain biking excursion, he meets the girl of his dreams as well as a group of violent locals who want to see them dead at any cost.
A man is accused of a series of murders that were actually committed by a crazed killer called "The Tiger." He must prove his innocence and catch the murderer.
A married couple on the verge of separation are leveled by the news their 18-year-old son committed a mass shooting at his college, then took his own life.
After dating a wonderful man, Hope comes back home, sees her daughter Jennifer and goes to sleep. She wakes-up in the woods with a psychopath...
An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.
Saga of a group of childhood friends growing up in a Los Angeles ghetto.
A biography of sports legend, Muhammad Ali, from his early days to his days in the ring.
A rich man's daughter is held captive in an abandoned apartment by two former convicts who abducted her and hold her ransom in exchange for her father's money.
Isa is beaten up after being accused of stealing $50. When his landlord demands the back rent, Isa gets angry and shoots him...
A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.
Jerzy is a writer and a chronic alcoholic. We meet him at the point when he believes that he can beat his addiction...
When her husband is taken hostage by his striking employees, a trophy wife (Deneuve) takes the reins...
Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.
A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to a pop singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.
Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.
A resourceful government agent seeks answers in a case involving a missing colleague and the disruption of the American space program.
Chance Harris looks to find a balance between his school, work, relationships and opportunity to perform at the nationally televised step competition during homecoming weekend at Truth University.
Albert Fish, the horrific true story of elderly cannibal, sadomasochist, and serial killer, who lured...

Prequel to the first Missing In Action, set in the early 1980s it shows the capture of Colonel Braddock during the Vietnam war in the 1970s, and his captivity with other American POWs in a brutal prison camp, and his plans to escape.
A common man works as a tax collector in a small city. A TV journalist uncovers the mysterious hero's back story.

A madcap comedy about Xaviera's attempt to make a film in Hollywood based on her book. Getting mixed up with some of the biggest crooked producers in town, she beats them all at their own game, and makes the film without them.

An eager and idealistic young attorney defends an Alcatraz prisoner accused of murdering a fellow inmate. The extenuating circumstances: his client had just spent over three years in solitary confinement.
Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.
After the Allies liberate Naples in 1943, the life for the locals is not much easier, especially for women. Many sacrifice their dignity and morale to survive.
A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is an addict.
Into the life of a widowed professor comes a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.
When a truck trafficking children is intercepted in the desert by the army, one of the traffickers is captured...
After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.
In an Earthly world resembling the 1950s, a cloud of space radiation has shrouded the planet, resulting...
A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
(Korean with English subtitles) A squad of Korean soldiers is sent to investigate a guard post that overlooks the DMZ...
The twisted tale of Kenneth, socially insecure technical writer who forms an obsessive relationship with "Nikki"...
In the heat of the summer of 1976, drama teacher Vivienne fights sweltering heat and general teenage apathy to put on an end-of-term version of Shakespeare's The Tempest.
A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.
Modulf is bullied by the toughest guys at school. And that's fine. Because then he saves the other kids from being bullied. Then Lise arrives - a new girl in class.
Louis Mahe is a tobacco planter at Reunion Island. He is waiting for Julie Roussel to marry her. He only knows her by mail...
Seven segments related to one another only in that they all purport to be based on sections of the book by David Reuben...
A wrongly convicted father comes home after 13 years in prison to discover his real battle is building a relationship with his daughter.
A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.
Young viscount Pym manages to to get an army leave on the pretense of running for the Conservatives in the next local election...
Based on the true story of how the FBI brought down one of Detroit's most notorious mobsters.
Tenuously based on the legends of Easter Island, Chile, this story details a civil war between the two...
At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.
A group of cooks at an asylum for the criminally insane get locked in with the inmates during a massive thunderstorm.
A young pilot in the German air force of 1918, disliked as lower-class and unchivalrous, tries ambitiously to earn the medal offered for 20 kills.
A mod London photographer seems to find something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.
Michael and Jenna, having been a couple for three years, want to get married and start a family. These...
A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

A DEA agent and a naval intelligence officer find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.
The prequel of KL Gangster, tells history of two brother Jai and Malik.
Mandy slaves away at two jobs struggling to support her family while dreaming about resurrecting her father's martial arts academy, a once famous school now forgotten since an accident took his leg.
A brat who does not care about family business or the relationships in life, until Kareena kapoor comes along.
A young girl from South Los Angeles tries to make it to the National Spelling Bee.
This movie documents the Apollo missions perhaps the most definitively of any movie under two hours...
A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from the grave.
The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.
A small time hoodlum is divided between his conscience and loyalty to his boss when his cousin is murdered.
Deceased Siamese twin returns to haunt surviving sister
A historical drama that illustrates Russian author Leo Tolstoy's struggle to balance fame and wealth with his commitment to a life devoid of material things.
Extremely silly comedy about a self-indulgent private investigator who winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.
The inhabitants of Antonio Island, off the coast of Oregon, are about to unveil a statue honoring the four men (Castle...
A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.
A newlywed bride becomes infatuated with another woman, who questions her sexual orientation, promoting a stir among the bride's family and friends.
Michelle takes a job recommended by her counselor that lands her trapped in a mansion with three psychotic siblings hell bent on purging Michelle of her sins.
After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.
A portrait of soul legend Bill Withers.

column2: Animation Action Adventure Family Fantasy Romance
column8: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
A young man, who believes himself to be a vampire, goes to live with his elderly and hostile cousin in a small Pennsylvania town where he tries to redeem his blood-craving urges.
A bisexual petty criminal named Bob encounters a married couple arguing in a bar. Bob breaks up the...
A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.
A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.
For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in...

Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion where they get killed off one by one by the monstrous surviving members of a family massacre years earlier for trespassing on their living grounds.
In a dystopian future, a cross country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points that are tallied based on each kill's brutality.
An F.B.I. specialist tracks a serial killer who appears to select his victims at random.
When Juliette marries Jean, she comes to live with him as he captains a river barge. Besides the two of them...
During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

column2: Action Adventure Family Fantasy Sci-Fi Thriller
column8: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by a zoologist and a young woman whom he grew up with. A poacher from the past returns to seek vengeance on him.
Five American soldiers enter Nazi-occupied Europe on a covert assignment to kidnap the head of Operation Bernhard.

Since 1978, Anvil has become one of heavy metal's most influential yet commercially unsuccessful acts. In 2006, after a fledging European tour Anvil sets out to record their thirteenth album and continue to follow their dreams.
A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"
After Hee-jin's younger sister So-jin, who is possessed by a spirit,disappears,the neighbors die one by one and a secret underlying their deaths is revealed.
A loan shark is forced to reconsider his violent lifestyle after the arrival of a mysterious woman claiming to be his long-lost mother.
Two actresses who have auditioned for one part, sharing the same apartment with opposite personalities equals a night which either neither of them will forget - if they survive!
Always one step ahead of the Feds, Paul Boxer is the most inventive and principled smuggler in the trade...
A film comprising of 5 short stories by 5 directors. Each story is about a women.
Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.
After 8 years in prison, inventor Robert Axle struggles to win over his estranged family and catch up on current technology as he works to once again become the king of the infomercial.
Two actors. One play. Can the differences between the two egocentric men be put aside for the sake of friendship and theatre?
A documentary on Louise and Martine Fokkens, 69-year-old twin sisters who have worked as prostitutes in the red-light district in Amsterdam for over 40 years.
Birth: it's a miracle. A rite of passage. A natural part of life. But more than anything, birth is a business...
A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.
A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.
This sprawling, surrealist musical serves as an allegory for the pitfalls of capitalism, as it follows...
Ukerewe Island, in Tanzania is home to a large community of people who live with albinism. While many...
A female American reporter searches for her missing brother against the backdrop of violence and human smuggling across the US/Mexican border.
A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.
A drama that charts ten years in the relationship of a male-to-female transsexual's relationship with her lover.
Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.
During the First Lebanon War in 1982, a lone tank and a paratroopers platoon are dispatched to search a hostile town.
Eight volunteers find themselves fighting for their lives when a drug trial goes horribly wrong.
Wishing to become a successful Reggae singer, a young Jamaican man finds himself tied to corrupt record producers and drug pushers.
Ben secretly enters the local soapbox derby with a rag-tag group of friends to best school bullies.
After her husband unexpectedly leaves her, Grace Beasley (Kathy Bates) spontaneously travels to Great Britain to attend the funeral of Victor Fox...
A post-apocalyptic tale of a man and his son trying to survive by any means possible.
When a young doctor suspects she may not be alone in her new Brooklyn loft, she learns that her landlord has formed a frightening obsession with her.
A dramatization of the 1968 strike at the Ford Dagenham car plant, where female workers walked out in protest against sexual discrimination.

Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.
Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.
In the Salinas Valley, in and around World War I, Cal Trask feels he must compete against overwhelming...
A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.
The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.
In a time when stranger danger is ever present, a single father learns that it's the ones you trust most who have to be watched the closest.
Low-budget film about a young man given a mystical medallion by an Aztec shaman, in order to become...
In late 19th century's Netherlands, an albino woman and a blind man develop an indiscriminate love for one another. Will love be blind?
Jonathas lives with his parents and his brother, Juliano, in a cottage in a rural area of the Amazon...
A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.
Paula Parkins is the teenage daughter of wealthy parents whom don't seem to make time for her, so she looks for thrills as the leader of her all girl gang who steal, rob, and rape young men.
Christine (Phoebe Cates), a student at an exclusive all-girls private school, is in love with Jim, who attends an academy for boys nearby...

A re-imagining of the horror icon Freddy Krueger, a serial-killer who wields a glove with four blades embedded in the fingers and kills people in their dreams, resulting in their real death in reality.
An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.
A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
The story of a teacher and his students, set in an Italian high school.
James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.
A soldier from Earth crash-lands on an alien world after sustaining battle damage. Eventually he encounters another survivor...
The extraordinary story of three Rwandan kids who walk 3000 miles to the Soccer World Cup in South Africa...
Italy, September 1955. A Formula One driver crashes his car during a race, leaving him stuck in a small village but good surprises will come his way.
As a child, prodigy David Rosenberg played his trumpet at Carnegie Hall all the while bullied and abused for being a Jew...

A young man gets hooked on a website called "Death Tube," which broadcasts actual murders in real time. At first he doesn't believe it is real, until he is brought into the site itself. The killing game is about to begin.
Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.
A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.
A bored housewife wants to return to her former job at the music store her husband manages, but he has promised the position to an old flame...
Orphee is a poet who becomes obsessed with Death (the Princess). They fall in love. Orphee's wife, Eurydice...
A group of kids in Brooklyn form a gang. From this moment on they do everything together. This makes...
A film about the state of Chinese occupied Tibet and its history of oppression and resistance.
A rising country-music songwriter works with a fallen star to work their way fame, causing romantic complications along the way.
Alessandro teaches musicology at the university of Strasbourg. He is also a volunteer reader in hospitals...

Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.
An exploration of various interpretations of Stanley Kubrick's horror film, "The Shining".
Yellowbeard, a pirate's pirate, is allowed to escape from prison to lead the authorities to his treasure...
A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.
Tony's father Sam, abducted by aliens three years earlier, returns to earth and seeks out his wife and son...
A look at the early career of Wikileaks founder, Julian Assange.
Pete, an eight-year-old Catholic boy growing up in the suburbs of Chicago in the mid-1970s, attends Catholic school...
A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.
An aging cop is assigned the ordinary task of escorting a fast-talking witness from police custody to a courthouse. There are however forces at work trying to stop prevent them from making it.
A couple is haunted by a supernatural presence that is unleashed during a college experiment.
A friendship between a middle-aged upper-caste man in a village and a boatman's daughter raises eyebrows.
An estranged couple's vacation to save their troubled relationship goes awry when they find themselves under attack from the walking dead

The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.
When Stefania breaks up with her boyfriend Andrea, little does she realize what the summer has in store for her...
The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.
In order to escape her isolation, wheelchair-bound Christine makes a life changing journey to Lourdes, the iconic site of pilgrimage in the Pyrenees Mountains.
Canada's most famous hosers, Bob and Doug McKenzie, get jobs at the Elsinore Brewery, only to learn that something is rotten with the state of it.
Biopic based on the life of author Raymond Roussel.
An electronics expert creates a huge bookie broadcast system for his crime boss, and takes over operations when his boss is murdered. His greed leads him on a deadly destructive path.
The film is set in the India of the tumultuous 1930's when nationalists fighting for the country's independence rose up as one...
A comic drama about a time in the near future when citizens are happy to be property traded on the stock exchange.

A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins.
A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
Two brothers, one wanted for murder, are shipwrecked on an island inhabited by nubile young women who have amassed a valuable cache of pearls.
Rightly suspected of illicit relations with the Masked Bandit, Flower Belle Lee is run out of Little Bend...
The late, great impresario Florenz Ziegfeld looks down from heaven and ordains a new revue in his grand old style.
The stories of several people are told as they stay at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth which features dining at "Separate Tables."
A clown comes back from the dead to haunt those who took his life during a fatal party mishap.
A series of comedic short films guaranteed to offend.
A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.
A teenage boy's search for love finds him fixated on a boy who lives nearby.
A documentary that follows the R&B/hip-hop boy band as they travel across the US on their first major headlining tour.

This feature-length documentary follows a group of people whose lives are dramatically transformed by a virtual world -- reshaping relationships, identities, and ultimately the very notion of reality.
The extraordinary true story of Oliver Woodward. It's 1916 and Woodward must tear himself from his new...
At 41, Luis is a confirmed bachelor, happy with one night stands, a success as a creator of perfumes...
After losing a powerful orb, Kara, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.
A ruthless, domineering woman is married to an alcoholic D.A., her childhood companion who is the only living witness to her murder of her rich aunt seventeen years earlier.
Two roommates deathly afraid of ghosts both fall in love with a girl who believes their home is haunted.

A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.
A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink
Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?
The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.
A Vietnam Veteran uses his combat skills against the lawman of a small town when they arrest and abuse him.
Four Black women, all of whom have suffered for lack of money and at the hands of the majority, undertake to rob banks...
A turbulent and intriguing love story between two parking officers in the city of Los Angeles.
Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing; a troubled adolescent girl.

Thus begins a terrifying experience where the teens are taken to a secluded house of horrors, where a young, would-be killer is being nurtured.

column8: Set during a massive flood started by a dam accident in a small town, Tom (Christian Slater) is an armored...
James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.
Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.
A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.
A crazed killer known as "The Bat" is on the loose in a mansion full of people.
A chronicle of a group of friends in rural France in 1918. Garris and Riton live in Marais, a quiet region along the banks of Loire river...
Val is 23 years old and full of dreams. She travels to New York to become an actress. She is lonely in a strange country...
A young woman commits a hit-and-run, then finds her fate tied to her victim.
A group of strangers trapped in a time warp house where a terrible event transpired exactly 100 years prior.
A battle for survival as hikers encounter a chemically imbalanced forest.
Eight different people are invited to their 10-year high school reunion at their now-closed down high school where a former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is there to seek revenge.
Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

A group of delinquents are sent to clean the Blackwell Hotel. Little do they know reclusive psychopath Jacob Goodnight (Jacobs) has holed away in the rotting hotel. When one of the teens is captured, those who remain -- a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago -- band together to survive against the brutal killer.
A portrait of contemporary youth culture, where the lines between reality and fiction are blurred with often frightening results.
AIM leader Dennis Banks looks back at his early life and the rise of the American Indian Movement.
Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.
While trying to fix his Mustang on the road, Jimmy McGee gets a lift in the Cadillac of a sweet lady...
Biswambhar Roy is a zamindar (landlord) and the last of his kind. With the title, he has none of the perquisites...
Children are hidden away in the attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.
The career and life of Stanley Kubrick is explored through pictures, clips from his films, his old home movies, comments from his colleagues and a narration by Tom Cruise.
Chronicles the rise of Chess Records and its recording artists.
After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.
A young, extroverted left-wing activist who sleeps with her political opponents to convert them to her cause is successful until she meets her match.
An old shepherd lives his last days in a quiet medieval village perched high on the hills of Calabria...
Two strangers discuss love, life, and relationships after having a one night stand.
A documentary on Levon Helm, a founding member of The Band, at home in Woodstock in the midst of creating his first studio album in 25 years.
The first ever documentary film about the legendary Hell City Tattoo Festival and the connection of fine art...
A worn-out businessman and a beautician on the run collide in a Paris airport. Love arrives, all its hurdles be damned.
Two wedding planner-partners achieve success but differences turn them into bitter rivals.

Chico is a young piano player with big dreams. Rita is a beautiful singer with an extraordinary voice. Music and romantic desire unites them, but their journey - in the tradition of the Latin ballad, the bolero - brings heartache and torment.
A plan to steal a valuable work of art leads to murder.
A group of mourners and a man spat from the depths of Hades build a boat from the debris of New Orleans to rescue their lost loved ones trapped beneath the sea.

One winter night, Pilar runs away from home. With her, she takes only a few belongings and her son, Juan. Antonio soon sets out to look for her. He says Pilar is his sunshine, and what's more, "She gave him her eyes"...
Alejandra and her dad Roberto have just moved to town. She is new at school, he has a new job. Starting over is sometimes complicated when you have left so much behind.
A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.
Seth and Jonah are twins with a dangerous ability: telepathy. Things start to spiral out of their control...
Neha lives a wealthy lifestyle with businessman dad, Vishal Batra, and mom. She likes surfing the net...
Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Montana by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.
Rosa Lynn sends her druggie daughter Loretta and her children Thomas and Tracy away from the big city...
A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.
The rise and fall of the Essex Boys gang - the drugs, the violence and, of course, the murders. The real story is the most shocking of all.
An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in TV journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

An tale of revenge, honor and disgrace, centering on a poverty-stricken samurai who discovers the fate of his ronin son-in-law, setting in motion a tense showdown of vengeance against the house of a feudal lord.
A time-travel experiment in which a robot probe is sent from the year 2073 to the year 1973 goes terribly...
A woman goes in search for her daughter, within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill. Based on the video game.

An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.
Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

Before independence during the 1940's depicts the lives of poor carefree villagers who are lured to work in Tea plantation farms and how they are forced to live rest of their lives as slaves with no traces of hope and freedom.
A lost village. A rock band. A murder in the woods. The world is about to change.

After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.
The lives of an intertwined group of people take a new direction as all they have taken for granted starts to change...
Ripley continues to be stalked by a savage alien, after her escape pod crashes on a prison planet.
The story of a single mother who suffers from double vision; caring for her baby is a nerve-wrecking...
Greg Powell is a disturbed ex-con who recruits Jimmy Smith (aka Jimmy Youngblood), a petty thief, as his partner in crime...
A pair of shuttle astronauts leave their spacecraft to repair a satellite. There's an explosion. NASA loses contact for two minutes...
An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.
Judy O'Brien is an aspiring ballerina in a dance troupe. Also in the company is Bubbles, a brash mantrap...
Long wanted serial killer Gabriel Engel gets arrested in a spectacular police strike. Small town cop...
Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.
The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.
In the DMZ separating North and South Korea, two North Korean soldiers have been killed, supposedly by one South Korean soldier...
A touching mother-daughter relationship that reflects the modern South Africa.

A priest comes to a small town to help get rid of a monster whose blood coagulates very fast. This creates problems as the monster is very hard to kill and then decides to go on a killing spree of its own.
While researching his book In Cold Blood, writer Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.
An English student at a 1960's American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.
A war drama set during the Nazi invasion of the Soviet Union in June 1941, in which Russian troops held on to a border stronghold for nine days.
In the year before the 1904 St Louis World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.
At 10 years old, Chico Colvard accidentally shot his older sister in the leg. This seemingly random...
Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.
Extra-terrestrials flying in high-tech flying saucers contact scientist Dr. Russell Marvin as part of a plan to enslave the inhabitants of Earth.
An apprentice train dispatcher at a village station seeks his first sexual encounter and becomes despondent when he is unable to perform.
A Vietnam vet moves into an apartment and views in other people's windows across the street, meets one of the women, and discovers black theater.
Hidden Colors 2 is the follow-up to the critically acclaimed 2011 documentary about the untold history of people of African and aboriginal descent...
A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.
Set against the dramatic landscape of contemporary Afghanistan and the National sport of Buzkashi -...
A snowboarder's plans for his own snowboard park go awry when an ex-girlfriend returns to town.
In St. Jude, drug dealers and corrupt cops have destroyed an urban neighborhood. But newcomer, Hong, has the fighting skills and moral vision to save this town from itself.
The Animatrix is a collection of several animated short films, detailing the backstory of the "Matrix" universe, and the original war between man and machines which led to the creation of the Matrix.
A married woman agrees to have sex with another man for $1,000,000.
Mercy Callo is a U.S. Black Ops soldier who finds himself the only survivor of a botched prisoner extraction mission...

New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.
It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers bands together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.
A vengeful Australian policeman sets out to avenge his partner, his wife and his son whom were murdered by a motorcycle gang in retaliation for the death of their leader.
The life of a suburban American family is scarred after a nuclear attack.
When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.
The Wolves baseball team gets steamed when they find they've been inherited by one K.C. Higgins, a suspected...
A man is haunted by visions of a beautiful woman. When he finally meets her, he winds up involved in a Satanic cult.
Disgusted with criminals escaping the judicial system via technicalities, an idealistic young judge...
A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.
Mary, a writer working on a novel about a love triangle, is attracted to her publisher. Her suitor Jimmy...
An advertising CEO wakes up in the hospital speaking only in ad slogans.
A washed out former star in need of money has a get rich plan...start a volleyball team whose players consist of group of beautiful athletic strippers.
Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.
The story of legendary computer game developer Richard Garriott's spaceflight in October 2008.
A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.
Three unemployed actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to replay their bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

In a time when America's economy was crumbling and sense of community was in question, one guy left everything behind to see if he could survive solely on the support and goodwill of the 21st century's new town square: Craigslist.
A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.
A convict falls in love with his new cellmate's sister, only to become embroiled in a planned break-out which is certain to have lethal consequences.
An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.
Nick and Nora Charles, a former detective and his rich, playful wife, investigate a murder case mostly for the fun of it.
Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.
A group of models find themselves trapped in a factory inhabited by a cannibalistic degenerated family.

Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.
This is the story of a young Spanish director burned out by his job on TV, who went to India in search...
An urbane chef from a well-to-do family with very high ambitions goes on to find approval from his conservative father...
Naruto and Sakura are captured in a parallel world by Madara, who's intentions are to steal the jinchuuriki from Naruto.
Pearl Harbor follows the story of two best friends, Rafe and Danny, and their love lives as they go off to join the war.
An overly win-driven sportscaster goes too far and must perform community service during December as a bell-ringer for the Salvation Army.
When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.
Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.
A boy's life is turned upside down when he learns that he is the last of a group of immortal warriors who have dedicated their lives to fighting the forces of the dark.
An idyllic summer job holiday in Spain suddenly turns traumatic for a couple of young Polish students in love.

column2: Adventure Biography Drama History Romance War
column8: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.
After hiding his loot and getting thrown in jail, Ruby, a brooding outlaw encounters Quentin, a dim-witted and garrulous giant who befriends him...

Workaholic realtor Jim Evers, his wife/business partner Sara and their two children are summoned to a mansion. When they discover that the place is haunted, Jim discovers an important lesson about the family he's neglected as they attempt to escape.
A moving insight into the 1981 Irish hunger strike in the Maze prison near Belfast.
The story of a century: a decades-long second World War leaves plague and anarchy, then a rational state rebuilds civilization and attempts space travel.
Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.
A group of over-achieving Asian-American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extra-curricular criminal activities.
A shallow man falls in love with a 300 pound woman because of her "inner beauty".

A pack of Orphans help Oliver search for his father, who abandoned him when he was just a child. But what they come to find is an out of work actor that gave up on his dreams... That is, until Oliver steps in.
One week in L.A. in 1983, featuring movie executives, rock stars, a vampire and other morally challenged characters in adventures laced with sex, drugs and violence.
Toru recalls his life in the 1960s, when his friend Kizuki killed himself and he grew close to Naoko, Kizuki's girlfriend, and another woman, the outgoing, lively Midori.
This heartwarming film documents orphaned orangutans and elephants and the extraordinary people who rescue and raise them-saving endangered species one life at a time.
The spirit of a long-dead prisoner returns for revenge, haunting the prison's new governor.
Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose $250,000, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City and comedy follows.
A coven of devil-worshiping monks living in New York City search for victims for their sacrificial ceremonies.
A harrowing documentary of the Stones' 1969 tour, with much of the focus on the tragic concert at Altamont.

After accidentally knocking her best friend off a roof, Alyce is haunted by guilt and delves into a brutal nightmare wonderland of sex, drugs and violence, her mind tearing itself apart along with anyone else who gets in her way.
An Italian woman conducts a desperate search for her husband, a soldier considered missing in action in Russia - like fifty thousand others during WWII.
Sick young man drives around in his daddy's camper, looking for lone stray females to kidnap, torture, rape, and murder.
The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.
The story of a young ex-con Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a murder he committed as a child.
Fired from his job for exposing corrupt business practices, a former biotech executive turns to impregnating wealthy lesbians for profit.

column2: Adventure Crime Drama Fantasy Mystery Thriller
column8: A battle between the world's 2 greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.
Four guys set off on a world tour to enact the seven deadly sins. Based on the MTV Europe series "Dirty Sanchez".
A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.
Rajaram P. Joshi (Naseeruddin Shah) is a middle-class Clerk living in a chawl in Bombay. He is secretly in love with his neighbor...
On the run from an abusive husband, a young mother begins to train herself to fight back.
The struggles of Mary and her husband adjusting to retirement.
A young adult woman decides to revisit her past relationships in order to find some guidance in her current life.
200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/Alien hybrid clone who must continue her war against the Aliens.
Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.
A young playboy who learns he has one month until he becomes infertile sets out to procreate as much as possible.
A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.
At the turn of the century, Lodz, Poland was a quick-paced manufacturing center for textiles, replete...
In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.
While traveling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.
Two cannibalistic brothers kill various young women to make their flesh part of their new special dish at their rundown restaurant while seeking blood sacrifices to awaken a dormant Egyptian goddess.
Ernest joins the Army reserves so he can drive the bigrigs, but ends up being sent into combat!
Johnny Knoxville and company return for the third installment of their TV show spin-off, where dangerous stunts and explicit public displays rule.

An explorer visits what appears to be the ruins of a gothic cathedral. There seem to be some strange statues, though, whose faces follow him as he makes his way to the end; the sun comes out, and he stops at the edge of a cliff.
Space Pirate Captain Harlock and his fearless crew face off against the space invaders who seek to conquer the planet Earth.
Supernatural thriller in which a female reporter wakes up in a morgue to find herself a member of the undead. She vows revenge against the sect that put her there and hunts them down.

While on vacation with friends in Hyderabad, India, Caden Welles - a privileged young man with the world at his disposal - takes an unexpected turn in life after initially refusing to help a starving man and his daughter.

When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.
An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

Emily and Nate Weaver leave the city for the rural comfort of Nate's ancestral home in the country. Once there, Emily is plagued by horrifying visions and haunted by the ghosts inhabiting their isolated new home.
In busy downtown Seoul, a thuggish young man notices a fresh-faced college student who sits on a bench...
An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.
The story of the tragic relationship between the son of a property developer and the daughter of an auto rickshaw owner.
Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

A single mother moves into a new house with her daughter. Soon after the young girl has her first baby tooth fall off, she begins to recount that she is having nocturnal visits by a tooth fairy. It seems the house has a sinister history.

Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.
An 11-year-old boy gets a crash course in what it means to be a man when he spends a day with the ex-convict uncle he idolizes.

In 1950's, a populace of a South Korean island rebels against police brutality. The protesters are labeled as communists and the army is dispatched. One small village will be hit especially hard that day. Based on historical events.

When a mysterious terrorist attack causes chaos in the cities, a group of friends take refuge in their countryside cabin. But the challenges of living in a post-apocalyptic world soon take their toll on relationships within the group.
A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

column7: USA UK United Arab Emirates Afghanistan
column8: An espionage tale from inside the CIA's long conflict against Al Qaeda, as revealed by the remarkable women and men whose secret war against Osama bin Laden started nearly a decade before most of us even knew his name.
A portrait of the acting craft of John Cazale and a tour through the movies that defined a generation.
An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.
As part of an initiation into a club called the Sisters, a young girl must spend the night in a mausoleum.
When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.
One good cop has to fight the bad guys and take care of his partner's three little girls after he is killed in the line of fire.
A former criminal is drawn into a criminal endeavor and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.
A drama centered on a First Nations teenager trying to find his place in the modern world.
An uncompromising British school headmaster finds himself beset by one thing going wrong after another.
Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu leads to the rediscovery of his faith.

A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desedmona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?
Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

When Paul, an unemployed writer, decides to rent and live in a house that's rumored to be haunted, he puts his life and his relationships in grave danger as he obsessively attempts to get the story that will finally make his career.
A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.
The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.
Damien is a London copper with a past he's trying to forget. Before signing up for the force he ran with a football firm...

A military special operations team, led by a CIA case officer, are on a mission in the harsh and hostile terrain of Afghanistan where they find themselves in a Middle Eastern "Bermuda Triangle" of ancient evil.
On the threshold of 22nd century, furrowing the space, protagonist from the Free Search Group makes...
In this third installment of the 'Pusher' trilogy, we follow Milo (Zlatko Buric), the drug lord from the two first films...
In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.
A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.
Based on a true story. Naive teenagers plot to murder one of their own, who has been too much of a bully to them.
A Mysterious Alien Creature (MAC ?) trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a young boy in a wheel chair.
The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go bad and the two become enemies.
Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then he finds out the disfigured recluse living nearby is an ex-teacher.
1989 is an important year in the political history of Hungary. However, Petya and his friends couldn't care less...
A father struggles to keep his infant daughter alive in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things dies, he leaves it all to his nephew and his family. All including his house, his fortune, and his malicious collection of ghosts!
Concert footage and backstage documentary of singer Elvis Presley.
When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.
A high school teacher's unusual experiment to demonstrate to his students what life is like under a dictatorship spins horribly out of control when he forms a social unit with a life of its own.
A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.
Three unemployed parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.
Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

After he awakens in a hospital, a man tracks down and murders the man that left him and a bank teller for dead during a robbery, only to end up having the slain thief's associates come after him in retaliation.
A documentary that follows the Serbian performance artist as she prepares for a retrospective of her work at The Museum of Modern Art in New York.
A true WW2 story: the British must attack a German ship but it's safe in neutral Goa. So they send civilians, ex-soldiers about 60 years old.
Jatt Airways is a story of two brothers who want to get married to two sisters. Due to some misunderstanding...
F/X man Rollie Tyler is now a toymaker. Mike, the ex-husband of his girlfriend Kim, is a cop. He asks Rollie to help catch a killer...
An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.

A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.
An artist grows distant from his new wife as an irrational horror of premature burial consumes him.

column2: Drama Family Fantasy Musical Romance Thriller
column8: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic Christmas tale.
Three handicapped losers who form a band ask famous writer Dries to be their drummer. He joins the band and starts manipulating them.
Patsy Brand is a chorus girl at the Pleasure Garden music hall. She meets Jill Cheyne who is down on her luck and gets her a job as a dancer...
After aspiring poet Johann Wolfgang von Goethe fails his law exams, he's sent to a sleepy provincial court to reform. Instead, he falls for Lotte, a young woman who is promised to another man.
A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.
A young couple, Mary and John, awaiting a baby is in search for a house when they decide to buy that lovely old villa they found by coincidence...
A travel guide rediscovers her romantic side on a trip around Greece.
The parents of a girl who was killed by a savage dog are granted the opportunity to spend three days with their deceased daughter.
A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.
Based on the rise and fall of socialite Edie Sedgwick, concentrating on her relationships with Andy Warhol and a folk singer.
Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.
Dave returns to his hometown on the Massachusetts coast for his father's funeral, where his reunion with two old friends provides a healthy dose of reality.
A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great General Meng Yi, whom is sworn to protect a Korean Princess named OK-soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.
After witnessing a man's death in a bizzare accident, Father Pergado goes on a spiritual retreat, where...
Being away for many years, Amir returns to Bosnia and Herzegovina in order to take custody of his parent's remains...
Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.
A group of crooks, an ex con, his friend and a gun crazy gangster plan a drug heist, but not everything goes as planned.
An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a T.V. show.
Two guys take their bromance to another level when they participate in an art film project.
Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."
Based on a true story, North Face is a suspenseful adventure film about a competition to climb the most dangerous rock face in the Alps...
The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.
Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him. As his obsession increases, more and more similarities seem to arise.
In the back country of Louisiana, a group of friends unearth a terrible secret that unleashes a monster from the depths of the swamp.

When a woman tries to outwit her husband's sexy young mistress, the unexpected consequences include starring as King Lear in a very amateur production - with the mistress, an aspiring actress, playing The Fool.
When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.
An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.
At "Satan & Co., Inc.", the Devil is upset because too many people are going up to Heaven rather than down to Hades...
Suddenly Laura Mars can see through the eyes of a serial killer as he commits his crimes. She contacts...

Young British boys and girls travel to an isolated cabin after being promised a night of heavy partying. Instead of the fun they hoped for, they meet a killer out to reap vengeance on them for the death of his brother.
Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

Sam has been expelled from every school and now he must find a creative way to pay for school, which he finds in an escort business entitled Cougars, Inc., leading to lessons he never expected to get.

This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

Russia, 1936: revolutionary hero Colonel Kotov is spending an idyllic summer in his dacha with his young...

An alien narrates the story of his dying planet, his and his people's visits to Earth and Earth's man-made demise, while human astronauts attempt to find an alternate planet for surviving humans to live on.

A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

When a beautiful bride goes on a ocean liner with her new husband, he goes into hiding, and she becomes the target of a murder conspiracy.

The planet from "Alien" has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

column8: Riva is an operator, a man with charm and ambition in equal measure. Kinshasa is an inviting place. With petrol in short supply in DRC's capital...
When werewolf chief Jack Ferris is accidentally killed in a strip club the girls who work there have until the next full moon before his bloodthirsty wolfpack seek murderous retribution
At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

A master auctioneer becomes obsessed with an extremely reclusive heiress who collects fine art.

Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs; the queen feeds her a poison apple, but Prince Charming awakens her with a kiss.

A psychologically distraught woman is committed to a private sanitarium by the man whom she witnessed commit a murder.

In an act of vengeance, a young man, randomly kills two police officers. He escapes to the forest, where he is arrested by two other officers...

When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

A big city cop from LA moves to a small town police force and immediately finds himself investigating a murder...

A troubled young man retreats from the big city and his ex-wife for the tranquility of a small town. He is drawn into a relationship with a young woman whose boyfriend goes missing, leaving the new arrival as a suspect.

Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters and endeavor to build a village in order to protect themselves and about 1,000 Jewish non-combatants.

Paris 1913. Coco Chanel is infatuated with the rich and handsome Boy Capel, but she is also compelled by her work...
When three rebellious students leave their hometown to pursue their lifelong dreams in the big city...

Chronicles Jack Harris, one of the pioneers of internet commerce, as he wrestles with his morals and struggles not to drown in a sea of conmen, mobsters, drug addicts, and pornstars.

Summer in a new suburb outside Paris. Nothing to do but look at the ceiling. Marie, Anne and Floriane are 15. Their paths cross in the corridors at the local swimming pool, where love and desire make a sudden, dramatic appearance.
After a one night stand with Isabel, Alex realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

A man in London tries to help a counterespionage agent. But when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to both save himself and also stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

In 2054, Paris is a labyrinth where all movement is monitored and recorded. Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist, who fell in love...
Frank (Ray Winstone) is confined to a residential home, stricken with Alzheimer's - past, present ad future steadily disintegrating...
A woman is kidnapped. While in captivity, she manages to send a message out with a wandering cat. The cat's owner calls the FBI...
After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

column7: Bosnia and Herzegovina Germany France Iran

column8: It's 1938, but Stan doesn't know the war is over; he's still patrolling the trenches in France, and shoots down a French aviator...
An adaptation of the classic tale of a wealthy aristocrat with a blue beard.
After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.
Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

A mentally unstable Vietnam war veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.
Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in an establishment populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

After a tragic car accident that killed his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people but when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.
Boyka is back. This time he is fighting in the first ever inter-prison tournament with one knee.
A documentary that focuses on a group of young athletes in southern Louisiana as they work toward achieving their goals of becoming professional mixed martial arts fighters.
A young doctor goes to unconscionable extremes in order to remain in the service of a female patient with a kidney disorder.

It's 1947 and the borderlines between India and Pakistan are being drawn. A young girl bears witnesses to tragedy as her ayah is caught between the love of two men and the rising tide of political and religious violence.
Is the fjord witch just a legend or could it be that Satan's bride lives within the woods of Grytefjord...
After falling in love, three room-mates experience changes in their lives.

Lance Reed is forced by a psychotic stranger to confront his duplicitous past. Seeking retribution for a crime, the man forces Lance to reveal his inner most secrets by systematically removing his limbs.
Jack McKee is a doctor with it all: he's successful, he's rich, and he has no problems.... until he is diagnosed with throat cancer...
A snobbish producer makes a documentary about the extraordinary behavior of her neighbor who believes himself to be Superman.
An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President seriously, and embarks on a cross-country journey.

A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.
A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.
The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.
Disenchanted pest sprayer and single dad Freddie Manning is always trying to hustle a tiny bit more...
A young girl mets a boy, they take a trip to the country, and they wind up meeting a creepy old woman who lives in a closed-down resort.
A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.
15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.

With a dead body lying between them, two men wake up in the secure lair of a serial killer who's been nicknamed "Jigsaw". The men must follow various rules and objectives if they wish to survive and win the deadly game set for them.

A naive young tourist's road trip across Chile with friends turns into a waking nightmare.

A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to re-jump start his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.
The true story of Selena Quintanilla-Perez, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.
