A Trans-Siberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.
After being killed during a botched mugging, a man's love for his partner enables him to remain on earth as a ghost.
As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

The cryptkeeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.
Jack's favorite babysitter Elizabeth introduces him to the art of pumpkin carving on Halloween night. Nothing will ever be the same.

As a director travels across the country to find locations for his latest film, about a narcotics officer dealing with strange situations both in his life and work, the script he is writing begins to merge with his own life.
When her single mom runs off to California, Lauduree, a passionate environmentalist, clings to her rural home and a carbon sequestration experiment...
Because of an unusual aging disorder that has aged him four times faster than a normal human being, a boy enters the fifth grade for the first time with the appearance of a 40 year old man.
Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and modern, liberal father-in-law.
Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.
In rural 1800s England things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.
After being released on parole, a burglar attempts to go straight, get a regular job, and just go by the rules...
The new Turkish lecturer who came from a different country seems different from the first lecture. "First...
An examination of the life of acclaimed 'horse whisperer' Buck Brannaman, who recovered from years of child abuse to become a well-known expert in the interactions between horses and people.
Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.
Debt collector Tae Gun-ho, who lost his son five years ago, finds out he has liver cancer. The only...
Two geeky teens kidnap the world's most famous boy-band in an attempt to make them play at their high school and thus boost the girls' popularity.

A documentary about Roman Polanski, the man and filmmaker. Roman Polanski speaks about his eventful life story and career in conversation with Andrew Braunsberg, his former business partner, producer, and friend of many years.
A biplane pilot is saddled with a spoiled industrialist's daughter on a search for her missing father...
A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.
In 1941, the inhabitants of a small Jewish village in Central Europe organize a fake deportation train so that they can escape the Nazis and flee to Palestine.
The rise and fall of a young eccentric British writer, in the early 20th century.

Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to save his younger sister Ja In - who was dragged away by Manchurian.
This full-contact action drama, loaded with authentic mixed martial arts, is a transcending inspirational story of redemption.
Based on the legendary true story of the Red Dog who united a disparate local community while roaming the Australian outback in search of his long lost master.

Recent college graduate Benjamin Braddock is trapped into an affair with Mrs. Robinson, who happens to be the wife of his father's business partner and then finds himself falling in love with her daughter, Elaine.

The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.

Dr. Frankenstein's grandson, after years of living down the family reputation, inherits granddad's castle and repeats the experiments.

Two high school boys discover an imprisoned woman in an abandoned mental asylum who cannot die.
Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".
Based on former Marine Anthony Swofford's best-selling 2003 book about his pre-Desert Storm experiences in Saudi Arabia and about his experiences fighting in Kuwait.
After losing contact with Earth, Astronaut Lee Miller becomes stranded in orbit alone aboard the International Space Station...
An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

A woman's husband has disappeared on an expedition into the jungle. She hires a guide to take her into the jungle to find him. However, they discover that he has been captured by a savage female tribe.

After she's diagnosed with a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to take a European vacation.
A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

Tucker & Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are attacked by a group of preppy college kids.

A psychological thriller in which a deadly virus infects a small Ontario town.

Someone is strangling coeds in Perugia. The only clue is that the killer owns a red and black scarf...

A pill-popping mom has her drug-abusing teen son abducted into a private intervention facility that means well.

A murder opens up a bleak trail of long buried secrets and small town corruption for a worn out police detective and his squad.

After a run-in with the law, Haley Graham (Missy Peregrym) is forced to return to the world from which she fled some years ago. Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman (Jeff Bridges), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.
A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.
A Seattle-set rock & roll drama about a musician whose life and career is reminiscent of Kurt Cobain's.
A trio of girls set out to change the male-dominated environment of the Seven Oaks college campus, and to rescue their fellow students from depression, grunge and low standards of every kind.
Ulrik is reluctantly let out of prison after serving 12 years for murder. He has to cope with his gang...
A group of teenagers stumble upon a secret lab and encounter superior clones of themselves.
A sleek, possessed black car terrorizes everyone it comes in contact with in a small town in Utah.
A young man from Yorkshire inherits a sizeable legacy from his millionaire father. He decides to try...
A Group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood. Their main problem is that they're all self-centered and obnoxious.
Alain Evrard, a trucker who has just finished serving a prison sentence, is forced to temporarily move back to his mother's house...
As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.
A wedding at her parents' Annapolis estate hurls high-strung Lynn into the center of touchy family dynamics.
A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.
Young Tommy Hudler decides to become a security systems salesman, and is an instant success. Everything...

Jimmy idolizes bootlegger Matt, and when he refuses to implicate his friend, he is sent to reform school. He befriends Shorty, a boy with a heart condition, and escapes to let the world know about the brutal conditions.
A wacky inventor and his wife invite two other couples for a weekend party at a romantic summer house in the 1900s countryside.
Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young ladies in show business.
A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.
After his parents are killed in a car accident, Cody is left dealing with enormous guilt, caring for...
A debt-ridden young man attempts suicide, but is rescued only to find that his luck is finally turning.
In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.
Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.
A cursed gunman (Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.
A spiritual love-story set in the majestic landscape of Ladakh, Himalayas. Samsara is a quest; one man's...
Filmmakers Robert Baca and John Rizzo offer an entertaining look into the world and history of Apple, Inc.
An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.
Cassavetes' jazz-scored improvisational film explores interracial friendships and relationships in Beat-Era (1950s) New York City.
The CDC races against time to develop a vaccine against an extremely lethal virus.
When eccentric man-child Pee-Wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.
A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by Indians...

A group of college students ventured into the backwoods of Louisiana to find an abandoned school. For a class project, they filmed the school for evidence of the paranormal. To hunt for ghosts. They found what they were looking for.

Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his assassination.
Set in 1984, when the war on drugs was at its height, the story concerns a strain of mold developed...
A western set on the New Mexico frontier a few years after the Civil War and centered on a struggling young family and the mining company who wants to buy their land.
What starts off as a conventional travelogue turns into a satirical portrait of the town of Nice on the French Cote d'Azur, especially its wealthy inhabitants.

A surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love with one another, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted, by their families, the Church and bourgeois society.
A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.
When a traveling carnival comes to a small town, a lifelong slacker meets the girl of his dreams (Rachael Taylor) and wakes up tothe life he has yet to begin living.

On April 2nd 2011, LCD Soundsystem played its final show at Madison Square Garden. Documenting this once in a life time performance and an intimate portrait of James Murphy as he navigates the lead-up to the show, the day after, and the personal and professional ramifications of his decision.
A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.
Rahul embarks on a journey to a small town in Tamil Nadu to fulfill the last wish of his grandfather:...
Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.
Advanced students who take a special class are being tortured by their class rank.
A soldier's unexpected arrival affects two women's simple existence.

The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
The setting is Vienna. A young American woman is brought to a hospital after overdosing on pills, apparently in a suicide attempt...
A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
Apelike aliens build a robotic Godzilla to destroy Japan, and the true Godzilla may not be powerful enough to destroy it.
A zany comedy about two sisters, their gay best friend, and their overzealous stage mom. When one sister...

An American writer goes to a remote Welsh manor on a $20,000 bet: can he write a classic novel like "Wuthering Heights" in twenty-four hours...

A deaf woman who resurrects the ghost of a murdered young woman is forced by the spirit to a serial killer who turns his female victims into marionette dolls.
Romantic comedy about a woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries, and the man who helps her.
Based on the Korean legend, unknown creatures will return and devastate the planet. Reporter Ethan Kendrick is called in to investigate the matter...
On a warm September evening, college professor Ethan Learner, his wife Grace, and their daughter Emma are attending a recital...
A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.
Fog delays a group of travelers headed for New York. They wait at the V.I.P. lounge of London Airport, each at a moment of crisis in his or her life.
The crew of an Air Force bomber arrives in Pearl Harbor in the aftermath of the Japanese attack and is sent on to Manila to help with the defense of the Philippines.
A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.
After he's laid off, a husband and wife switch roles with her returning to the work force and he becoming a stay at home dad, a role to which he doesn't have a clue.

column2: Animation Action Adventure Comedy Family Sci-Fi
column8: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.
Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.
An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

A sex comedy centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.
Joe Fine moves his family from Brooklyn to New Orleans, where his dreams and extravagance far exceed his means.
A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.
After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.
The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a 19th century inventor-villain.
A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.
Picking up from where the TV series left off, Saki Morimi is back in the United States, trying to find Akira Takizawa...
Tells the true story of Johann Rettenberger, a marathon athlete who developed robbing banks as a hobby.
Three intercut stories about outsiders, sex and violence. In "Hero," Richie, at age 7, kills his father and flies away...
Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.
When a nobleman is threatened by a family curse on his newly inherited estate, detective Sherlock Holmes is hired to investigate.
Baek Jang-Mi is the female leader of an international pickpocket gang. Her target is to broaden her territory to outside Seoul...
It is 300 years into the future. Earth's environment had been devastated by mankind's own foolish plans...
A man wanders out of the desert after a four year absence. His brother finds him, and together they return to L.A...
A deep and reflective look at the arrival and impact of AIDS in San Francisco and how individuals rose to the occasion during the first years of this unimaginable crisis.
The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.
The Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.
Ovidiu, a high-school teacher looking for an extra buck, finds an unexpected way to earn easy money.
A maniac murders teens when they refuse to forward chain mail.

Captures a generational moment - young people on the cusp of truly growing up, tiring of their reflexive cynicism, each in their own ways struggling to connect and define what it means to love and be loved.
In this remake of the classic 50s SF tale, a boy tries to stop an invasion of his town by aliens who take over the the minds of his parents...
Pepi is raped by the policeman who catches her growing marijuana in her apartment. She seeks revenge by getting his masochist wife to leave him.

A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.
Takao, who is training to become a shoemaker, skipped school and is sketching shoes in a Japanese-style garden...

Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.
Phaedra is a poor sponge diver on the lovely Greek isle of Hydra. While diving, she discovers an ancient...
Based on true events, BELOW ZERO is a thriller with a 'Fargo' feel. It is the story of 'Jack the Hack'...
A hapless husband neglects to clear the icy walk, which leads to the mailman slipping and breaking his neck. A comedy of errors results from his attempts to hide the body.
In the small town of Stone Cove, Maine, deputy sheriff Dwayne Hopper is on the night shift at the police station...

column2: Adventure Biography Comedy Crime Drama Romance
column8: This movie is based on the story of Buster Edwards, one of the thieves involved in "The Great Train Robbery" of 1963.
A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.
Maria suffers from Alzheimer's disease. Luis, Maria's fifteen-year-old grandson, doesn't say very much...
A deluded taxidermist plans the perfect crime.

A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.
Bored with her husband, bored with her polo-playing lover, will the middle-aged heroine go away with...
The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.
Follows Martin Luther King's life and decades long civil rights activism.
Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.
Kelly, a prostitute, finds redemption in the town of Grantville, where she arrives working as a medium-time seller...
This animated short features two soundtracks - in one, Frank narrates an autobiography,in the other...
The classical story of Robinson Crusoe, a man who is dragged to a desert island after a shipwreck
7 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless kafkaesque maze containing deadly traps.
A biopic of French pop star Claude Francois, most famous for co-writing the song 'My Way'. Tracing his life from childhood in Egypt through success in France to his untimely death in Paris in 1978.

Exposed during an illegal arms trade gone wrong in Berlin, a North Korean "ghost" agent finds himself in the crosshairs of an international manhunt. Was he betrayed by his wife or his country? He must prepare to make the ultimate sacrifice.
A young doctor in a US hospital administers a powerful and untested cocktail of drugs to a coma victim...

In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.
When a motorbike gang kills an occultist, the evil spirit he was summoning inhabits a damaged bike. The bike is then bought and restored...
A troublemaking student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of being lesbians.
Focuses on the cyclical journey taken by all living creatures, from birth to having youngsters of their own.

School teacher is cheating on his wife and lies about it.
An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

When a noted anthropologist who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to a young psychiatrist to get through to him.
During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.
The sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community populated by New York City policemen slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

A Christmas obsessed Jewish boy on his way to sunny Florida figures out how to get the Christmas of his dreams by trading airline tickets and places with another boy on his way to snowy Christmastown, WA.

Curious kids unearth the barrels that helped revive the dead of the first film, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

Maximillian is the only survivor from a race of vampires on a Caribbean Island, and as a vampire, he must find a mate to keep the line from ending...
Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying/drinking/taking drugs they are arrested only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.

Special Agent Derrick Vann is a man out to get the man who killed his partner but a case of mistaken identity leads him to Andy Fidler, a salesman with too many questions and a knack of getting in Vanns way.

Valter goes to night school. Iara, his wife, says that the new tenants don't work, that they're probably criminals...
Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.
35-year-old architect Seung-Min receives a visit at his office from a woman. Seung-Min doesn't recognize the woman at first...
'About Face' explores beauty and aging through the stories of the original supermodels: women, now between fifty and eighty years old...
After almost getting killed in a terrorist attack during an international mission, Pablo, a Spanish...
Two old maid sisters are running a little family hotel in Spain. They are very religious and the moral...
US Army Staff Sergeant Wesley Kent returns from the war abroad and must now fight the threat of corruption and deception in his hometown at all personal costs.

A wheelchair-bound former singer and her best friend embark on a road trip from Kansas to New Orleans, Louisiana.

The vampire Mamuwalde (Blacula) is stirred by African voodoo, and is forced to kill again.

Stanley's attempts to treat Oliver's cold include dropping a swab down his friend's throat, applying a mustard plaster to his rump, and inflating the air mattress from the gas jet until it has Oliver pressed against the ceiling.
In a futuristic London, the rising sea levels mean that large areas are under feet of water. Hauer plays...
A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.
A feature-length documentary about our complex relationship with manufactured objects and, by extension, the people who design them.

The only son of wealthy widow Violet Venable dies while on vacation with his cousin Catherine. What the girl saw was so horrible that she went insane; now Mrs. Venable wants Catherine lobotomized to cover up the truth.
It is the time of the Spanish Inquisition. Maria does not like what is going on during the "Auto De Fe"...
Americans are captured on surveillance cameras at least 170 times a day mostly without their knowledge. This produces millions of hours of footage revealing the nature of those hidden secrets.
How do we understand faith and prayer, and what of miracles? August 1925 on a Danish farm. Patriarch Borgen has three sons: Mikkel...
A small town priest struggles with his faith.
An eastern immigrant finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.
When an island off the coast of Ireland is invaded by bloodsucking aliens, the heroes discover that getting drunk is the only way to survive.
Two thirtysomethings, unemployed former alcoholic Joe and community health worker Sarah, start a romantic...

A man and his son search for a stolen bicycle vital for his job.
Jo, Max, Gwen and Dave win the competition.Then they head off on an all expenses paid trip to New York...
A realistic road movie about a drug addict, his 'family', and their inevitable decline into crime.
Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.
After Jonathan Harker attacks Dracula at his castle (apparently somewhere in Germany), the vampire travels to a nearby city...

When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
A strange lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.
A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

Two families from different walks of life learn to work together.

Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.
The life of a real conman and one of the biggest frauds in Brazil.
Paloma is a serious and highly articulate but deeply bored 11-year-old who has decided to kill herself on her 12th birthday...

In New York City, Brandon's carefully cultivated private life -- which allows him to indulge his sexual addiction -- is disrupted when his sister arrives unannounced for an indefinite stay.
A Group of teenagers test the legend of an immortal witch and get more than they bargained for.
The fates of an aging hitman and a washed up detective become entwined when one last job leads to one last chance to settle an old score.
Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.
A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
George Washington McLintock, "GW" to friends and foes alike, is a cattle baron and the richest man in the territory...

Aging Cuban musicians whose talents had been virtually forgotten following Castro's takeover of Cuba, are brought out of retirement by Ry Cooder, who travelled to Havana in order to bring the musicians together, resulting in triumphant performances of extraordinary music, and resurrecting the musicians' careers.

A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why.
A brain tumor allows a person to change the past by reflecting at relevant pictures.
A basque priest finds by means of a cabalistic study of the bible that the anti-christ is going to be born on Christmas day in Madrid...
Danzig in the 1920s/1930s. Oskar Matzerath, son of a local dealer, is a most unusual boy. Equipped with...

After a baby monitor picks up another channel, Anna begins reliving the nightmare she'd recently escaped.

A film where anything can happen - the hero and the heroine changes their faces, age, look, names, and so on...
The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy his father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.
A man who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

Following the conclusion of the storyline in the "Fight For Your Right" music video, the Beasties break into a liquor store, drop acid with groupies, and get into a breakdance competition with time-traveling future versions of themselves.
Schoolteacher Hisako Oishi struggles to imbue her students with a positive view of the world and their place in it...

After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.
The story is set in 1962 Louisiana. The Batiste family is headed by charming doctor Louis. Though he is married to beautiful Roz...

A relatively boring Los Angeles couple discover a bizarre, if not murderous way to get funding for opening a restaurant.

A portrait of famed Chilean singer and folklorist Violeta Parra filled with her musical work, her memories, her loves and her hopes.
Oliver stands to inherit a large fortune from his rich Uncle Bernal, with the condition that he be happily married...
A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.
Unable to cope with a recent personal tragedy, LA's top celebrity shrink turns into a pothead with no concern for his appearance and a creeping sense of his inability to help his patients.
A family inherits what proves to be a haunted house, but a special pair of goggles allows them to see their ghostly tormentors.
Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

When her father seemingly goes missing, Laura LeCrois is forced to return home and face a terrifying creature living in the Louisiana wetlands: Alligator X, the "T-Rex of the ocean!"
A spoof of vampire-themed movies, where teenager Becca finds herself torn between two boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.
An ordinary Japanese family slowly disintegrates after its patriarch loses his job at a prominent company.
A struggling musician takes an overnight long-distance drive in order to fight his estranged wife for custody of their young daughter.
The Los Angeles punk music scene circa 1980 is the focus of this film. With Alice Bag Band, Black Flag...
Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
She searched for a home, she searched for love. Confronted by Apartheid and a father who was Minister of censorship...
The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.
A successful talk show host leaves Los Angeles to reunite with his family in the Deep South.
Film adaptation of street tough Jim Carroll's epistle about his kaleidoscopic free fall into the harrowing world of drug addiction...
Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.
Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.
When the now famous "star crossed lovers" of two enemy families meet, forbidden love ensues.
Cyprus 1974. A Cypriot family flees advancing Turkish forces and takes refuge in an abandoned Ottoman-era palace...
It's the 70s and criminal boss Renzo and his crew wreak havoc across the streets, leaving bodies wherever they go...
A Mexican-American master chef and father to three daughters has lost his taste for food but not for life.
Jarrod and his pregnant girlfriend Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his old friend and successful entrepreneur Terry...
A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.
When a store clerk organizes a publicity stunt, in which a friend climbs the outside of a tall building, circumstances force him to make the perilous climb himself.
Two high school nerds attempt to create the perfect woman, but she turns out to be more than that.
A group of nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's day weekend.

During the First World War, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German POW camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are sent to a seemingly impenetrable fortress which seems impossible to escape from.
Investigative documentary probing the background of the Finnish doping scandal of Lahti 2001 FIS Nordic world ski championship and the sports culture that enabled it.
Army doctor Robert Neville struggles to create a cure for the plague that wiped out most of the human race.
The Devil arranges for a deceased gangster to return to Earth as a well-respected judge to make up for his previous life.
Giorgio is a greedy adulterer who makes a deal with a serial killer to dispose of his wealthy wife, Nora...

Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.
Wanting to start a fresh, Katrine moves from the province into a dormitory in Copenhagen and enrolls at the University...
Lincoln Hawk (Stallone) is a struggling trucker who arm wrestles on the side to make extra cash while trying to rebuild his life...
A drummer coaches a low-class dancer to stardom.
a love story...
A rising indie band travels to Spike Island, Cheshire, in May of 1990 to see The Stone Roses.

When the mother of his infant son unexpectedly passes away, struggling actor Mark grapples with fatherhood and his inability to grow up. And when he sparks with a single mother, he learns how his choices have real-life consequences.
A high school student named Brett Bumpers receives a mysterious package one day. He does not know who gave it to him...
Randall, a terminally ill meter maid, wants nothing more than to live out his final days in peace. Unfortunately, his family and friends have other ideas.

Umay is a young woman of Turkish descent, fighting for an independent and self-determined life in Germany against the resistance of her family. Her struggle initiates a dynamic, which results in a life-threatening situation.

Two young Mexican attorneys attempt to exonerate a wrongly convicted man by making a documentary. In the process, they expose the contradictions of a judicial system that presumes suspects guilty until proven innocent.
Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body, but instead inadvertently brings him back to life. Now Jason wants revenge, and Tommy must defeat him once and for all.

The mother of Louis, Philippe and Henri Delcroix has been taken to hospital. She is in alarming condition and might well die...
Blackmailed back into the arena by a ruthless crime boss, a former underground fighting legend must survive a gauntlet of savage matches where losing just one fight... means losing it all.
On their chase of a serial killer two cops find a diary in which all committed murders and many more to come are predicted.
The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.
Seven strangers on a Hollywood movie studio tour are trapped inside an infamous House of Horror and forced to tell their most terrifying stories to get out alive.
A little boy goes on an adventurous quest in search of his father.
A group of six ex-high school cheerleaders are stalked by a killer with a medieval war hammer and battle axe during their first Spring Break from college.
'Septic' Baird has just joined a front line RAF squadron at the height of the Battle of Britain. This...
Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

George has just been released from prison, and manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer. Initially they don't get on; he doesn't fit in with the high class customers Simone services. Will they ever get on?
Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...
In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?
Everyone knows that the stork delivers babies, but where do the storks get the babies from? The answer lies up in the stratosphere...
Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his arch-enemy, Professor Ratigan.
A young coed (Nan Barlow) uses her winter vacation to research a paper on witchcraft in New England...

The arrival of a newborn girl causes the gradual disintegration of the Cairn family; particularly for 9-year-old Joshua (Kogan), an eccentric boy whose proper upbringing and refined tastes both take a sinister turn.
Accused barn burner and con man Ben Quick arrives in a small Mississippi town and quickly ingratiates himself with its richest family, the Varners.
Tom Ripley, who deals in forged art, suggests a picture framer he knows would make a good hit man.
J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly 50 years, looks back on his professional and personal life.
An American ex-con with Mexican underworld ties ensnares a pair of young misfits into a dangerous heist in Mexico. Inspired by true events.
To a song of love lost and rediscovered, a woman sees and undergoes surreal transformations. Her lover's face melts off...
Angela has been shot point blank by her boyfriend and lives in a world where the living and dead co-exist...
A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

Pat's ability as a logging/mining camp fighter sets him up to box prizefighter Corrigan. Unknown to his supporters, he's actually in collusion with Corrigan to throw the fight - until he runs into reporter Maude.
14 years have passed since the near third impact. Most of the world has changed except Shinji Ikari who awakens...
After 42 years, feisty and delightful lesbian couple Edie and Thea are finally getting married. From the early '60s to the present day...
Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.
In the 1930s, fictional jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute.

The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother who he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

column2: Action Adventure Comedy Romance Thriller Western
column8: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.
Nena, a girl from the south of Italy, has to travel far from home to get her first job as a teacher...
An ex-con battles it out in the cage to pay for the operation that would save the daughter of his victim. Along the way he finds fatherly love, and friendship, in the most unlikely of places.
Touring makes you crazy, Frank Zappa says, explaining that the idea for this film came to him while the Mothers of Invention were touring...

The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Connecticut.

On her birthday, 11-year-old Angeliki jumps off the balcony to her death with a smile on her face. An investigation is started as to the reason for this apparent suicide, but the family keeps insisting that it was an accident.
A 19th-century samurai tries to protect a battered wife.
Wazed Ali Shah is the ruler of one of the last independent kingdoms of India. The British, intent on controlling this rich country...
The story of the legendary martial arts icon Bruce Lee following him from Hong Kong to America and back again.
Set in a future-world vision of Tokyo where the police have been privatized and bitter self-mutilation...
A comedy about a New York City couple (Schreiber and Hunt) in romantic and family crises.

A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.

The incredible story of the 1992 Lithuanian basketball team, whose athletes struggled under Soviet rule, became symbols of Lithuania's independence movement, and - with help from the Grateful Dead - triumphed at the Barcelona Olympics.
Young 27 year old woman who's is passionate about track. Because of her loveless lifestyle, she's being pressured by her sister...
Englishmen race to find the tomb of Ghengis Khan. They have to get there fast, as the evil genius Dr...
A young couple spend the night in a restaurant, only to find out that it is haunted by three dead women who hunger for human flesh.
A group of holidaymakers head for the Spanish resort of Elsbels for a 4-day visit. When they get there...

Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

Mary Surratt is the lone female charged as a co-conspirator in the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln. As the whole nation turns against her, she is forced to rely on her reluctant lawyer to uncover the truth and save her life.
A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.

People are being killed by someone or something using superhuman strength. A clever DA Assistant is sent to investigate. Is this just a way to commit the perfect murder or will the legend of the Jersey Devil prove to be true?
The final candidates for a highly desirable corporate job are locked together in an exam room and given a test so simple and confusing that tension begins to unravel.
Upon hitting puberty, a high school boy realizes that he is homosexual and faces prejudice from his homophobic parents and friends.

At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop. Set against this backdrop, a lonely teenager named Luke Shapiro spends his last summer before university selling marijuana throughout New York City, trading it with his unorthodox psychotherapist for treatment, while having a crush on his stepdaughter.
A Yankee sea captain has adventures in paradise trying to become an entrepreneur in Micronesia.

A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

Jonathan Vandermark is a music teacher with a weakness for young men with great aspirations and without a pot to piss in. When Sebastian enters his life and takes advantage of John's charity, his life and afterlife will be changed forever.
Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.

Rebecca has a very unusual secret, one that not even her best friends know about. The last person on...

Facing a failed relationship and a struggling restaurant, a woman hits the road for a trip with her grandson.
Cinematic spin-off from the popular TV series. Hard-bitten Flying Squad officer Jack Regan gets embroiled...
An ex-mercenary known for finding missing children is hired by a mixed martial arts fighter whose daughter has been kidnapped.

When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.

Three wives engage the services of a private investigator after they suspect their respective husbands of infidelity.
A dramatization of one man's rescue of Jewish refugees in the Nazi-occupied Polish city of Lvov.

During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.
A young writer tries to impress a girl he meets online with an embellished profile, but he finds himself in a real mess when she falls for him and he has to keep up the act.
While working on a writing project on the island of Ischia, a married woman (Bosworth) enters into an affair with a younger man.
Lee Long is a martial-arts champion who the police use as an undercover agent to infiltrate a drug ring...

A womanizer teaches his clueless friend the rules about being single and avoiding emotional attachment.

Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.
Three brothers are separated and united after many years - one is brought up a Hindu, another a Muslim and the last (and most memorable) a Christian. Hilarity and adventure ensues.
Kelly Sherwood is terrorized by a man with an asthmatic voice who plans to use her to steal $100,000 from the bank where she works...
An African American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.
After a 20 year absence, drifter, George Walker, returns home to settle his grandmother's estate. As if awakening from a long dream...
Four couples find themselves struggling to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.
A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

A word. What is the pervert? Sex freak, deranged degenerate, disturbed diabolical psychotic subversive embracer of things both erotic and erratic...

column8: The true story of Richard Pimentel, a brilliant public speaker with a troubled past, who returns from Vietnam severely hearing -impaired and finds a new purpose in his landmark efforts on the behalf of Americans with disabilities.

Muzafar and Feruz are two good-hearted shepherds from Taboulistan... a tiny country in Central Asia that no one has ever heard of...
A writer is accused for plagiarism by a strange man, who then starts haunting him for "justice."

Girl from the "wrong" side of the tracks falls in love with an ambitious young man from the "right" side of the tracks.
A journalist covering police assigned to a juvenile division enters an affair with one of her subjects.
Inspector Wens moves into a Paris boarding house to catch a serial killer.
When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.
A documentary of the conflicting attitudes of the opponents of the Vietnam war.
The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.
After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.
Though he has an adoring wife, a bourgeois man is still tempted to pursue other women.
Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 70's, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.
The recently divorced Dado starts a torrid affair with the beautiful Francesca. Trouble is, she is already taken - by the equally beautiful Andrea...
In the years after the Revolution that overthrew the Qing Dynasty in China and established the republic...
A demented boss works six captives to death.
Roving clans of shape-shifting human/hyena creatures prowl and hunt for human prey. They are hunted by one man seeking revenge for the death of his loved ones.
Julia finds 300 million pesetas hidden in a dead man's house while selling an apartment. She's a 40-ish...

An uptight, conservative, businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.
A gynecologist attempts to rid the world of sexual problems by separating sex on the one hand and reproduction, which he feels should be left to artificial wombs.

After witnessing the brutal murder of his parents, a young boy is raised by a martial arts master who grooms him to be a lethal killer. Some 20 years later, it's time to take revenge on the assassins who destroyed his childhood.
A 19th century woman, who has become one of the undead, acts as a hired killer in modern times. When...
Three girls in 1980s Stockholm decide to form a punk band -- despite not having any instruments and being told by everyone that punk is dead.
After he's fired from his job -- by his mother, no less -- Bob Funk agrees to quit drinking, see a therapist, and eventually report to a new boss, who might just be the woman of his dreams.
Martin, a young Argentine student, is exploring the reactions of his sports coach, Sebastian, while vying for his love and affection...
In a surreal, parallel universe, Thessaloniki has its very own superhero: Super Demetrios. Posing as Dimitris Christoforidis...
The story of a fastidiously organized businessman, whose perspective on life is forever changed through an unexpected encounter with a tiny fledgling bird.

An aging Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons--his sole purpose being to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

Follows a team of Vatican investigators sent to the British West Country to investigate reports of paranormal activity at a remote church.

Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom?

From Spike Lee comes this vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school-teacher, her stubborn jazz-musician husband and their five kids living in '70s Brooklyn.

Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.

One by one members of a special project team are being killed by telekinesis - the ability to move things with the power of the mind alone. The race is to determine which of the remaining team members is the murderer and to stop them.
The tale of a murderer (Allen) who uses the cover of Halloween night to causally transport his latest...
A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.
When notorious pirate Henry Morgan is made governor of Jamaica, he enlists the help of some of his former...
Three activists cobble together a kidnapping plot after they encounter a businessman in his home.
John Travolta stars as a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.
A look at the life, times, and art of independent film pioneer John Cassavetes through interviews with his family, friends, and admirers of his work.
A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.
A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.
A group of friends along with members of the Russian mafia get stuck on a remote island off the coast of Goa, when new drugs at a rave party are consumed by the guests, turning them into zombies.
When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance & Phillip, they are pronounced "corrupted", and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.
William S. Burroughs: featuring never before seen footage as well as exclusive interviews with his closest friends and colleagues...

When Berke Landers, a popular high school basketball star, gets dumped by his life-long girlfriend, Allison...
An ex-con man and his five trained Dobermans help a Treasury Dept. agent stop a racketeer and his gang.
When college friends reunite after 15 years over the Christmas holidays, they discover just how easy it is for long-forgotten rivalries and romances to be reignited.
In 1940 Sally Maitland is forced to leave England, ostracised as a Nazi sympathiser by everyone including her well-to-do family...
Feature documentary about the great West Indies cricket team of the 1970's/80's.
In Chile, 1973, during the last days of Salvador Allende's presidency, an employee at a Morgue's recording office falls for a burlesque dancer who mysteriously disappears.
Bud and Lou find themselves pursued by an Egyptian cult for a special medallion linked to a walking mummy.
An idealistic adolescent, suffering under the thumb of a sadistic schoolmaster, falls in love with a loose girl who is bullied and tormented by another lover.
Bekir is in love with Ugur, who loves Zagor who loves to commit crimes.
For 25-year-old Sebastian it is all about surface and appearance. Life is full of party, money and one-night stands...
A citizen of the Veneto in her sixties. Three stories of "love in the country": a pseudo Don Giovanni...
The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.
A look at the life of President Park Chung-hee and the events leading up to his assassination.
Two missionaries are kidnapped and held for ransom while serving in Russia.
Six outwardly average individuals have elaborate fetishes they indulge with surreptitious care. A mousy...
A reluctant samurai with a dark past sets off on a mission to fulfill his destiny.
Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.
The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.
The funny and moving tale of Joe Fulton who can fix anything for anybody but he can't achieve success himself. But maybe today will be different!
At the lowest point of his life, Richie gets a call from his estranged sister, asking him to look after his nine-year old niece, Sophia, for a few hours.
A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.
After housewife Eve Peregrine writes a sudden hit novel, her husband George, a successful fashion photographer...

When two poor greasers, Johnny, and Ponyboy are assaulted by a vicious gang, the socs, and Johnny kills one of the attackers, tension begins to mount between the two rival gangs, setting off a turbulent chain of events.
When cholera takes the parents of Mary Lennox, she is shipped from India to England to live with her Uncle Craven...
The New York film set mascot who overcame homelessness and alcoholism to become a fixture of the New York film industry, with over 100 small parts to his name.
Melissa is a nice and pretty girl with natural dreams and ambitions. But because of bad influences, her life becomes a nightmare. Until her real friends decide to get her out of there.
I see you through my eyes.
Eagle vs Shark is the tale of two socially awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love; through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games.
An old local jeweler in Dubai is visited by a strange man that no one can see but himself.
Andrew Lloyd Webber's CATS, the most famous musical of all time, first exploded onto the West End stage in 1981...
A wheelchair-bound young girl returns to her father's estate after ten years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.
The moving story of a plain young girl who becomes pregnant by a black sailor, befriends a homosexual, and gradually becomes a woman.
In an unnamed Latin American country that closely resembles Mexico, the government fights a rural insurgency with torture...
A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond platonic friendship.

Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years just before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. The abused and suppressed children of the villagers seem to be at the heart of this mystery.
A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.
A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge
Eddie thinks it is time for his father to remarry. However, in his opinion his father's taste in women leaves much to be desired...
On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events...
A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.
The loons are back again on Golden Pond and so are Norman Thayer, a retired professor, and Ethel who...
Story of Manu, who is forced to act as the husband of his boss, so that she gets a visa extension to avoid going back to Australia.
An insurance rep lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.
A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.
A woman is led by her family to her new husband's home, to live with, presumably, his elderly mother and younger brother...
An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.
A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.
In a 15th-century feudal village, a woman is accused of witchcraft and put to death. Her beautiful older...
A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.
A fresh face comes to Hollywood to act in movies but only the gay porn studios are eager to provide him with work.
The girl next door, having coffee, lunch with a friend, shopping, unaware she is becoming an obsession...
