The filmed account of a large Canadian rock festival train tour.
A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.
The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.

A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.
The world goes backwards on Opposite Day. The kids become adults, and the adults become kids.
Nine-year-old Lisa discovers her sinister new friend is the ghost of the dead twin of Lisa's mother...

Three sisters and a group of their friends take a trip to the home of the recently deceased grandfather -- who died a particularly grisly death -- to learn more about the promise of an inheritance, only to encounter a family of psychos who have taken up residence in the old man's cabin.
The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.
An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides.
(Korean with English subtitles) Ha-eun is a housewife physically abused by her mixed martial artist husband regularly...
An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.
Young Danny Flynn is released from prison after 14 years after "taking the rap" for the IRA and tries to rebuild his life in his old Belfast neighborhood.
William Kamkwamba, a young Malawian, builds a power-generating windmill from junk parts to rescue his family from famine...
A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.
A down-on-his-luck American Indian recently released from jail is offered the chance to "star" as the victim of a snuff film...

Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.
Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the evil Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain...
A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.
When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.
In 1950s Baltimore, a bad-boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good-girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.
The story of Dr Feelgood, four men in cheap suits who crashed out of Canvey Island in the early '70s...

Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.
A madman kills a man who has just inherited a large estate, then impersonates his victim to gain entrance to the estate so he can murder his enemies.
Lady avenger returns to western town owned by a ruthless gunslinger hosting an elimination tournament.
An English king comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant, who finds his true honor by observing God's divine will rather than the king's.
At 10, Fanny Price, a poor relation, goes to live at Mansfield Park, the estate of her aunt's husband...
A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.
Unable to get accepted, four academically-challenged students decide to open their own college.
Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand one another, without realizing that they're falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.
The Acunas, a rich Argentine family, have the tradition that the daughters have to get married in order...
New York actors rehearse Chekhov's "Uncle Vanya" in a dilapidated theatre.
Bad blood between two urban crime families explodes into an all-out turf war in this gritty, hard-hitting drama set to rap and starring music legend Sticky Fingaz.
Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.
The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.
In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.
At South Korea's border with the North, troops guard the coast. Each bullies those ranking beneath him; tensions are high...

As single mom Grace juggles work, bills, and her affair with a married doctor, her daughter, Ansiedad, plots a shortcut to adulthood after finding inspiration in the coming-of-age stories she's reading for school.
Fletcher Munson, the lethargic employee of a pseudo-religious self help company, and his doppelganger, the friendly but dull dentist Dr. Jeffrey Korchek.
When a Mongolian nomadic family's newest camel colt is rejected by its mother, a musician is needed for a ritual to change her mind.

Journalist C.J.Hunt's global quest for a solution to the obesity epidemic and diet-related disease. It explores modern dietary science, previous historical findings, ancestral native diets and the emerging field of human dietary evolution.
Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.
A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his tribe and his parents whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his warriors when he was a boy.
A young trumpeter enjoys highs (musical success, fame, and fortune) and lows (sour marriage, death of his mentor, bout with alcoholism).
After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.
Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.
After saving an infant of royal blood, knight Brancaleone forms a new army and sets out to return the baby to his father: a prince fighting in the Crusades.
A man and a woman, engaged to marry different people, spend a couple of hours chatting together at a train station only to fall for each other.
Explores the under-representation of women in positions of power and influence in America, and challenges the media's limited portrayal of what it means to be a powerful woman.
The true story of Rocco Granata, an Italian coal miner's son who followed his passion for music against his father's wishes and social barriers.
The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
A Japanese assassin stranded in Taiwan must take work from a local crime boss to make ends meet when suddenly a woman from his past delivers a son to him.
A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.
Three years after the failure of the last BR program, a second act is forged and a class of students are sent to an island with one objective: kill international terrorist Shuya Nanahara.
Butch "Bullet" Stein is a Jewish junkie from the mean streets of Brooklyn, is paroled after eight years in prison...
For the young man who lives in Serbian province town, the maturing coincides with the turbulent political events of the year 1968.

Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Years later the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.
In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.
In London, a street dealer's life spins out of control over the course of one week after he borrows money from his supplier on what's supposed to be a sure thing.
Neddy Merrill has been away for most of the Summer. He reappears at a friends pool. As they talk, someone...
When terrorists seize control of a boarding school, a group of troublemaking boys decide to resist them.
It's night on a Paris bridge. A girl leans over Seine River with tears in her eyes and a violent yearning to drown her sorrows...
Los Angeles, 1949: A secret crew of police officers led by two determined sergeants work together in an effort to take down the ruthless mob king Mickey Cohen who runs the city.
A homicide detective and a fire marshall must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.
Two Criminals and one wants the other to get killed.
Life from a parrot's point of view.
The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid, and the security boss discovers the plot.
A gang of innocent but feisty kids who lead carefree lives in Chandan Nagar colony takes on the big bad world of politics when one of their friend's life is endangered.
A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

A commando squad rescues a hostage being held by a terrorist, but their helicopter is shot down and falls into an unexplored valley. They quickly realize it is inhabited by dinosaurs, for which soldiers are a tasty morsel.
A Florida couple deals with an unexpected pregnancy while holding minimum wage jobs.
Love can be painful. Very painful. The intriguing-on-the-outside, twisted-and-tortured-on-the-inside...
True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.
The story of five teenage girls who form an unlikely bond after beating up a teacher who has sexually harassed them...
A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.
The Falcon and reporter Ann Riordan try to solve a string of murders after an ex-wrestler, released from jail, goes looking for his girl friend.

Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.
Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.
At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.
Based somewhat more authentically on the Grimm Brothers' story of a young woman who is unliked by her stepmother...
Mystery Inc. must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.
A group of Los Angeles teenagers meet every day at their local diner hangout to discus their latest misadventures with their miserable lives.
A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

After three centuries, three witch sisters are resurrected in Salem Massachusetts on Halloween night, and it is up to two teen-agers, a young girl, and an immortal cat to put an end to the witches' reign of terror once and for all.
Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein (goaded by an even madder scientist) builds his monster a mate.
A fantastic tale of war, love, family and ambition set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.
A documentary that takes an alternative approach to dealing with the global warming crisis.

column6: English Urdu Arabic Persian French Mandarin
column8: A politically-charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved and affected by it.
A mysterious person calls a young man and informs him that his estranged father has died in a country village...
Police lieutenant Nyman is murdered in his hospital bed and Martin Beck and his colleagues have another murder to solve...
After three women are released from prison, we follow them for their first day of freedom.

Young Penny goes on a retreat with her psychologist; the intention is to help her overcome her phobia, an intense fear of cars. Unexpected events find her in a nightmarish situation where her worst fears come true.
Fu Manchu inoculates ten women with poison, to kill ten world leaders.
After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins...
A young man comforts his older brother's wife and children after he goes missing in Afghanistan.
An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her home's new owners.
Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.
Brooklyn, 1975: two brothers looking for a way out of their working-class neighborhood make a pact to rob a local theater on the night of a Rolling Stones concert.
In the near future Paris, a cop is searching for his wife's killer. The trail leads him to a high tech medical clinic where everything is not what it seems.
A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.
Elsa, a woman with a long history of depression in the midst of a divorce from her husband of 12 years...
An unemployed actor with a reputation for being difficult disguises himself as a woman to get a role in a soap opera.
A tough cop is given his most difficult assignment ever: to masquerade as a kindergarten teacher in order to find a drug dealer.
When a young man starts his early morning run through the woods, he has no idea what this special day will have coming as a surprise for him - but how could he, it's his birthday.
Christian is a Copenhagen wine seller on the brink of bankruptcy. Equally unsuccessful in just about every other aspect of life...
A reporter and a promiscuous young woman try to solve a series of child killings in a remote southern Italian town that's rife with superstition and distrust of outsiders.
Millionaire playboy Hugo (whose lack of facial expressions give him the appearance of a Thundercat marionette)...
Farhad Pastakia (Boman Irani) has a dream job as a bra-and-panty salesman. Except that he is a 45-year...
In a city left torn by war, when a series of murders awaken dormant memories, many fear the worst. Colm Meaney ("Hell On Wheels"...
After graduation, five friends set out to make a difference in the world for God. Their ambitions are high...
A comedy that follows nine very different couples on the night they conceive, showing that sex can sometimes be more neurotic than erotic.
Efterklang goes to an old Russian mining town, Piramida, to get inspired for their new album.
Unable to get intimate with her husband of 10 years, a woman embarks on a steamy affair with his brother.
A sharp-witted comedy that follows a group of apparent strangers in interlocking stories taking place in ten different bars during the course of one evening throughout Los Angeles.
When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.
Punishment Park is a pseudo-documentary purporting to be a film crews's news coverage of the team of soldiers escorting a group of hippies...
A hapless Navy grunt is assigned SP duty. The catch : he must escort a beautiful female prisoner on her way to prison for going UA...
Portrait of a closeted gay husband/father living a life of quiet middle-aged desperation who becomes fixated on a friend's handsome collegiate son, leading to an incident.
A lurid, dark look into the lives of sex workers, where victims of child abuse deal with the consequences later in life.
Sensitive, somewhat effeminate farm-boy Duncan Mudge can barely cope with grim, since Ma's death even gloomier father Edgar's manly expectations...

Life becomes so harried after Ensign Pulver's prank, he and the Captain are swept off deck during a storm, ending up on a tropical island, a group of ship wrecked nurses, dancing natives and 1 very big case of appendicitis.

Newlyweds Nick (Ice Cube) and Suzanne (Long) decide to move to the suburbs to provide a better life for their two kids. But their idea of a dream home is disturbed by a contractor (McGinley) with a bizarre approach to business.

An uptight New York tax lawyer gets his life turned upside down, all in a single day, when he's asked to escort a feisty and free-spirited female ex-convict whom asks him to help prove her innocence of her crime.
In a wealthy and isolated desert community, a sound expert is targeted as the prime suspect of a series...
When former black ops operative Cross (Seagal) and his partner Manning (Austin) are assigned to decommission an old prison...
One hour before the State Opening of Parliament, something very unusual happens. The Prime Minister...
Part three of the "Three Mothers" trilogy which takes place in Rome and has to do with Mater Lachrymarum (The Third Mother).
Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.
After getting dumped by his slutty girlfriend, Caleb falls in love with Gwen. However, thanks to Caleb's roommate, Gwen thinks he's gay and sets him up with her roommate, Marc.
A newly wedded couple attempt to build a house with a prefabricated kit, unaware that a rival sabotaged the kit's component numbering.

Layton and Luke are caught up in an adventure, when a masked figure steals an entire opera house and forces those in attendance to play a high-stakes game. The winner will receive eternal life, but it could mean death for the losers.
Deaths tells the story of an all-American guy who is murdered each day by horrifying pursuers, only to wake up in slightly different lives to experience the terror of being murdered again.
In eighteenth century England, "first cousins" Tom Jones and Master Blifil grew up together in privilege in the western countryside...
A historical drama based on the founding of the Republic of China when nationalist forces led by Sun Yat-sen overthrew the Qing Dynasty.
A series of mishaps manages to make a young man get chased by a big city's entire police force.
The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.
A wild weekend is in store for three high school seniors who visit a local college campus as prospective freshmen.
An in-depth look at honeybee colonies in California, Switzerland, China and Australia.
A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.
Elvis is a singing rodeo rider who drifts into an expensive dude ranch patronized by wealthy glamour girls...
As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.
Norman Bates is still running his little motel, and he has kept the dressed skeleton he calls mother...
Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.
Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.
An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne (Franco) and the princess of the feuding Irish (Myles) spells doom for the young lovers.

Two small time scam artists, Black and Blue, sell boom boxes and broken TVs from their van at the parking lot. When, by mistake, a shipment of cellular phones gets to them, it doesn't take long before FBI and gangsters are after them.
In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.
The bane of adolescent Bart Collins' existence is the piano lessons he is forced to take under the tutelage of Dr...

A former drug lord returns from prison determined to wipe out all his competition and distribute the profits of his operations to New York's poor and lower classes in this stylish and ultra violent modern twist on Robin Hood.
Yolly (Nora Aunor), a flower vendor and her brother Efren (Dan Alvaro), who works as a driver and hired...
Juan Garcia is a boy on the threshold of manhood living in a gang-controlled neighborhood. His role...
A young man's attempt to break out of a cycle of violence. When country-girl Tia comes to stay with her cousin in the city...
The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

Follows the lives of five interconnected couples as they experience the thrills and surprises of having a baby, and realize that no matter what you plan for, life does not always deliver what is expected.
Frank Leone is nearing the end of his prison term for a relatively minor crime. Just before he is paroled...
Lester and Orville accidentally launch a rocket which is supposed to fly to Mars. Instead it goes to New Orleans for Mardi Gras...
L.A. soft-porn writer Carter Webb is frustrated enough after his actress girlfriend dumps him to need a serious break...
Ji-na and Sang-min are a divorced couple. Rather than going their separate ways, they keep taking revenges to each other.
Mogan is a young woman who is stalked by two thugs through the back alleys of an urban wasteland. But on this night, the would-be attackers get more than they bargained for.
A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.
Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.
A single mom caught up in the Florida drug trade during the late 1970s tries to make a better life for her two girls.
An active volcano threatens a south Pacific island resort and its guests as a power struggle ensues between the property's developer and a drilling foreman.
A jealous husband and his friends plot the kidnapping of his wife's lover with the intention of restoring his wounded ego.

Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.
A Spanish orchestra conductor deals with the mysterious disappearance of his girlfriend.

Lucas and Clementine live peacefully in their isolated country house, but one night they wake up to strange noise... they're not alone... and a group of hooded assailants begin to terrorize them throughout the night.
Laura is still waiting for Prince Charming at the age of 24. So when Sandro appears at a party, exactly like her Prince would in her dreams...
SciFi suspense thriller in which a rescue space ship crew meets up with horrors projected by their own imaginations.
Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.
Counter-terrorist Jack Quinn misses his target, Stavros, on the eve of his final mission. From there...
A 1973 concert by Elvis Presley taped at the Convention Center in Honolulu, Hawaii. This was the first program to ever be beamed around the world by satellite.
A womanizing art dealer and a painter find the serenity of their Riviera vacation disturbed by a third guest, a vivacious bohemian woman known for her long list of male conquests.
Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.
Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.
Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.
Two young women, marginalised by society, go on a destructive tour of sex and violence. Breaking norms and killing men - and shattering the complacency of polite cinema audiences.
A group of teenagers encourage each other's bad behavior in a chatroom "Chelsea Teens!".
Poltergeists attack a family in Yorkshire during the 1974 nationwide blackouts.
Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.
A coming-of-age tale charting the first loves, lusts and obsessions of friends on vacation at the end of the 1970s.
While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness.
Drukkersbloed revolves around the intrigues, politics, scandals and envy in the African music industry, leading to the murder of a journalist.

A young reindeer who suffers from vertigo learns to overcome his fear, takes flying lessons from a clumsy flying squirrel and heads to the North pole to save a troubled Santa and his fleet of flying reindeer.
When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.
American planes are sent to deliver a nuclear attack on Moscow, but it's a mistake due to an electrical malfunction. Can all-out war be averted?
A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
A new crime wave grips the city and all clues seem to lead to the nefarious Dr. Mabuse, even though he has been imprisoned in a mental asylum for nearly a decade.
In a modern retelling of Tod Browning's "Freaks" (1932), "Freakshow" tells the story of a group of criminals...
A psychoanalyst and his family go through profound emotional trauma when their son dies in a scuba diving accident.
One day in New York City, as Jane Ryan tries out for an overseas college program and her sister Roxy schemes to meet her favorite punk rockers...
An undisciplined boy must learn Drunken Fist Kung Fu in order to stop an assassin.
The fantasy of creating the perfect woman is as old as Pygmalion, but how close is it to becoming a reality...
Director Kevin Booth navigates through the cutting edge of Cannabis research while becoming a foster parent to a child court ordered to take powerful mind altering drugs.
Synthetic kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives for ever.
Having both lost their jobs, two strangers become unlikely friends after a run in with a would be robber, who is actually a hitman with a grudge against the two.
A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.
In this darkly karmic vision of Arizona, a man who breathes nothing but ill will begins a noxious domino...

A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches art, Andy's a college dean. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.
A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.
When a young deformed boy witnesses his mothers death, he comes back to take revenge on anyone who dares enter his property.
The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.
Three divorced fathers are forced to live together.
This documentary follows NBA superstar LeBron James and four of his talented teammates through the trials and tribulations of high school basketball in Ohio and James' journey to fame.
Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.
Life isn't easy for a group of high school kids growing up absurd in Japan's pervasive pop/cyber culture...
A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated tomatoes that KILL!
The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.
A fading Hollywood star looks back at the days of his youth as he returns home from his best friend's funeral.
A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.

After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live.
On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.
A young woman fumbles with love and ethics as she navigates a career with one of corporate America's darlings...the pharmaceutical industry.
Madea jumps into action when her niece, Shirley, receives distressing news about her health. All Shirley...
Inspired by true events. Cast into a violent and bloody world of murder, Hereward, a novice monk, must deliver the Holy Gospel of Lindisfarne...
A college hockey player and a female journalism student struggle to find common ground with their spiritual faith and scientific studies.
Alberto, a divorced father, takes his two children for a vacation at a thermal resort in Salto. Things...
A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.
Hawaii, Oslo is the story of a handful of people who cross each other's path without necessarily knowing each other...
At an inn which is only open on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.
A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.
In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.
Mr. Neville, a cocksure young artist is contracted by Mrs. Herbert, the wife of a wealthy landowner...
Terry works for a bank, and uses computers to communicate with clients all over the world. One day she gets a coded message from an unknown source...
A serial killer pins his crimes on two college students who gave him a ride.
An Asian-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.
A young man comes to the city to save his ancestral property , but later learns that a corrupted chief minister is against him.
An officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who has a tie to his past.
Chronological exploits of Iwao Enokizu, a murderous thief on the lam.
Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two come back together. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love, among other things.
In 1714 Peru, a friar is tried by the Inquisition for questioning God's intentions when five die in the collapse of an Andean rope bridge.

The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.
A Soviet-trained assassin is determined to escape his double life as a hitman and as a husband-father.
A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.
Stan and Ollie try to hide their pet dog Laughing Gravy from their exasperated, mean tempered landlord, who has a "No Pets" policy.

column2: Crime Drama Film-Noir Mystery Romance Thriller
column8: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband... but even once the deed is done, they must live with the consequences of their actions.
A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line the line between fantasy and reality.
Passionada is a romantic comedy about a Portuguese widow whose husband, a fisherman, died at sea. The...
A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler...but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.
After a harrowing snowmobile accident, a young couple is stranded in the woods and must survive while waiting for help to arrive...
Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter.

A Secret Service Agent is held captive in the trunk of a car and endures mental and physical torture as terrorists attempt to extract information for their plot against the President of the United States.
To save her fortune from a designing nephew, Matilda Reid must locate her three long-lost adopted sons in time for a Christmas Eve reunion.
A Polish rabbi wanders through the Old West on his way to lead a synagogue in San Francisco. On the...
A homicide investigator goes after a media-obsessed serial murderer who videotapes his victims's deaths
